column5: Spanning 180 feet and 30 feet high, Mantle Rock is an impressive natural sandstone bridge owned by the Nature Conservancy in Livingston County Kentucky.

column1: Mantle Rock is also part of the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail, memorializing the harsh winter of  1838-39.
column2: An enormous natural sandstone bridge in Kentucky.
column3: ['Ben E. Clement Mineral Museum', 'Cave-In-Rock', 'Garden of the Gods']
